message.content:
{"id": "116786", 
"title": "Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path", 
"description": "When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should correctly generate and save the relative path. For example, if my report design is located in $project/test and I include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary, the relative path should be saved as $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.",
"OB": "The BIRT designer is not generating or saving the relative path correctly when including libraries in a report design.",
"EB": "The BIRT designer should generate and store the relative path when including libraries in a report design.",
"SR": "Modify the BIRT designer to correctly generate and save the relative path when libraries are included in a report design. Verify this functionality by including a library from a different directory and checking that the relative path is saved correctly."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '116786', 'title': 'Bug 116786Library include should store relative path.', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Bug 116786Library include should store relative path. When a library included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generatethe relative path, and save relative path.Example $project/test contains my report design. ', 'SR': 'When a library included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generatethe relative path, and save relative path.Example $project/test contains my report design. now include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary. '}
